MJ- Love mask

[photo]27073281[/photo]

Three unique characteristic of MJ mask:

1 Function-That every mask has 12-layer Cotton gauze has anti-bacteria dust function.Our Production is supported by YAGE Health Materials Co. Ltd,having strict quality standards .Production License Number41,Production Executive Standard:GB19084-2003,
Health License:TongWeiXiaoZi(2003)0222.In cold winter and H1N1 Serious time, We belive our
mask will give y0u Considerate and warm
2 Aesthetics:We have often encountered such a situation : mask is beautiful but not functional,beautifulor functional but not beautiful,even some mask will breede bacteria.This time we will let you enjoy the two
3 Collection-All masks are limited.What is more,only do LOVE4MJ the beautiful and functional mask.

Attention:Our products have been second hand aseptic processing, process is complicated;If there is a little defects.It is entirely normal.Please be kept informed about it!

Retail Price:5 dollers

Wholesale price for 5 off(More than 2,500 U.S dollars for the first time and later each subsequent purchase is not less than 1000 U.S. dollars)

Size;unisize

Co-operation

1 Network Agent?

Firstly,Agent qualification is only provided for the people living in the agent country(for example:If you want to apply for American agent,you must live or stay in America)and has your own Network Exhibition Space?ebay ,blog and so on) is needed for agent sell. Secondly,please write a application(including your name,nationality,telephone number and Marketing Plan),After we verify your information ,we will send you a proxy authorization paper and related product data packets.Thirdly, selling price of agent is not less than LOVE4MJ's internet retail price,but we will give agent 20% discount compared with internet retail price .Finally,In order to be convenient for you,LOVE4MJ will provide delivery service for you,that means the only thing you need to do is to Provide your final-user of the receipt information and LOVE4MJ will deliver goods With the fastest speed from China.

2 Wholesaler?

The first time agent purchases goods should be more than 2,500 U.S dollars and later each subsequent purchase is not less than 1000 U.S. dollars,What is more,you can get 50% discount of love4mj internet retail price.

How To Buy

1. Browse our blogs first on Website and then choose what your favorites.(every blog has one MJ product)

2. Write down all related information of your favorite MJ products so that you can contact our customer service immediately.
Customer service :w214001154@yahoo.com.cn

3. Choose one method of payment that you are convenient:

a . Use paypal,our paypal account is :chinawanqi@yahoo.com.cn,please do contact our customer service and comfirm it after you remit money to us.

b .Bank transfer: our remittance account is:CMB SWIFT number(you can do it in any bank which is in the SWIFT of the world):CMBCCNBS241, Payee Name:wanqi.Account:6225 8802 8990 8288, Card -issuing bank:Chengdu ShuHan Road bank, CMB Branch .Usually,your remittance will be in our account in three working days,so please do contact our customer service immediately.

c. Use WESTERN UNION,our remittance information is:Name:wanqi,Address:Chao-Rong huayuan 3-8-2-A,TongShanqiao South Street,FuNanxinqu district, Chengdu,China.Telephone number: (86)13880340680.please do contact our customer service and comfirm it after you remit money to us.The address of Chinese as follows,you can print it and paste:

4.LOVE4MJ promises that once we have received your remittance ,we will send out goods and inform the buyer as soon as possible.

5 .To check all goods and post your photograph by email If you would like?Do write your information(including name .address and nationality). we will make a global communication albums of LOVE4MJ for your communication with MJ fans all over the world.

About Express

With regard to transport issues, usually, Customers are free to choose any of the following express company and can log on to calculate the costs.If the client has no special designation, we will choose the lowest corporate services for you,but the time roughly need about 3 to 5 working days.For example: China to Germany, DHL's price: about 36 euros (Lifting: 1 kg), about 14 euros(Continued weight: 1 kg),China to the United States, DHL's price: about 41 U.S. dollars (lifting: 1kg),about 20 U.S. dollars (Continued weight: 1 kg)

In addition, if customers want to lower the price of transportation, we can choose a Chinese ordinary international mail . The relative price of the above approach can save about 50%, but probably the time can need more than double.

If customers purchase a large amount of wholesale , we will choose a cheaper way for you.

About LOVE4MJ



Our concept:

Michael jackson is not idols, but belief in the heart of MJ fans. He deserves THE KING OF POP. Firstly ,In the professional, he is almost the only one that is able to reach such peak success in singng as well as dance and music. He began to his carrer at the age of 5 and left us at the age of 50, he has gained so great success during his 45 musical careers , however, he said he has never satisflied with what he had done.It is no exaggeration to say that his spirit of extremely harsh requirementshas for music makes a good example for all the first -class Star. Secondly, Michael jackson is the embodiment of love .He loves children, cherishes nature and has compassion for human , he devoted his life to charity . Indeed,he is our angel who always maintaines the purest and childlike innocence in his deep heart. LOVE4MJ aimes at promoting his spiritual values, so that lost people will find themselves from MJ's soul, leading them to the right direction of their own.Let's remember the humble king forever——OUR LOVE FOR MJ FOREVER!

Our products:

We have two products,one is MJ Native Products(including all the MJ Clothing and accessories In concert or MTV ) the other one is Derivatives(containing the characteristics of MJ elements.Anyone can wear in daily life).so people would buy anything you want, regardless of the stage clothing or the daily accessories .what is more, every LOVE4MJ products are of good quality, affordable, and short of supply, it is worth collecting!

Our wish:

we hope that one day all over the world MJ fans will wear MJ suits ,stayed with MJ's soul forever!Do not forget the word that MJ loves to say :GOD BLESS YOU! In fact ,MJ is the God of fans and MJ will bless every one of MJ fans .MJ always believe that one day all his fans will meet together and become a warm family. By the way ,If you would like , Please take a photograph putting the clothes from LOVE4MJ and send it to us .we will send you a big surprise as for your return In every June 25! Thank you!
